Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Esculentin-2PRb (natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals; XXU; 1S=S, UCSS1a)
Sequence Information.Source: North America,the Oregon spotted frog  Rana pretiosa

Literature Information.Literature: Active against E. coli (MIC 25 uM), S. aureus (MIC 12.5 uM), and C. albicans (MIC 50 uM).Toxicity: Moderate hemolytic HC50 35 uM. Updated and name corrrected 11/2019; 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Conlon JM, Mechkarska M, Emanahmed, Coquet L, Jouenne T, Jérômeleprince, Vaudry H, Hayes MP, Padgett-Flohr G2011
Literature Information.Title: Host defense peptides in skin secretions of the Oregon spotted frog Ranapretiosa: implications for species resistance to chytridiomycosis
